reviews.text: We found this lovely Romanian restaurant while walking around old town. The food was delicious, great value and the staff were very friendly. Highly recommend

If it was possible I could rate this place with -10! One start is too much!

The food is tragic to say the least. Terrible! For this price, the quality should be wonderful. The service was not bad except that the waiter was forgetful and we had to remind him. He could also guide us on what was worthwhile and what wasn't. The "little from everything" platter was ABSOLUTELY unacceptable for 155 lei!!! I would never do it again, I wouldn't even think about it.

Excellent Romanian cuisine, had the Moldovan Meatballs and Sausages with Cabbage and both were amazing. Good service with English speaking helpful staff. Basement area is a beautiful brick lined space. Outside seating also available when the weather is good.

the food was amazing but the service was really bad. they kept hawking at us trying to take our plates. we felt rushed and couldn’t enjoy sitting down to eat our dinner. then at the bill we saw the tip was included, if the service was nice we wouldn’t care but we were pushed to leave from the moment our food arrived on our table.
I had a mango cake and coffee. The mango cake was delicious and tasted like mango. Coffee was good. Good location and would go back again.
